item.title: Potential Issues With Spring Jpa Properties You Should Avoid in Production
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Java developers love the Spring Framework since it has gained immense popularity due to its simplicity, flexibility, and robustness. Spring is a powerful tool that simplifies the development of enterprise applications by providing various features and functionalities. One such feature is the Spring Data JPA, which is an abstraction over the JPA specification. Although Spring Boot provides a powerful auto-configuration feature that makes it easy to configure and set up various components of an application, misconfiguring certain properties can lead to unintended consequences and potential issues.
